actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 11:00 a.m. on August 27, 2024.

actions-list.header: ADJUSTMENT OF THE WHOLE NUMBER OF THE HOUSE
actions-list.actionItem: Under clause 5(d) of Rule XX, the Chair announced to the House that, in light of the passing of the gentleman from New Jersey, Mr. Pascrell, the whole number of the House is 431.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by Rabbi Arnold Resnicoff, U.S. Navy Chaplain, Retired, Washington DC.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Barry Loudermilk to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
